message: Akushima lies motionless on the ground, eyes and mouth open wide.
...I did it.
I let out a sigh of relief and stand up.
Mink's guys are already gone. They probably made it downstairs alright.
Phew...

That's one problem taken care of. Any second, though, my headache is gonna return with a vengeance.

I brace myself for it... but nothing.
My headache is gone.
Every time I've used my power before, it's made my headache worse. Why would it be different this time?
The only thing I can think of is...
...the fact that this time, I wanted to use it.
For once, I chose the power. I used it to open my path.
Could that be why?
I hear an explosion in the distance. The entire hall shakes.
Is this what Mink's guys were talking about?

Blowing up the tower...<k>
Wait. What about Mink?!
...Of course.
Getting out was never part of his plan.
He always meant for his men to blow up the tower with him still inside.

name: トリ
message: "Get on."
The bike stops in front of me.

name: トリ
message: "Mink ordered me to get you out safely."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh...? He did?"

name: トリ
message: "Yes. He told me to make sure you and his men get out safely."
Mink used my power to accomplish his goal.
But he never had any intention of bringing me along with him.
Mink planned it all, even how it would end.
From the very beginning, he never meant for anyone but him and Toue to die.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Shit!"
He drags me around like some kind of ragdoll, then at the very end tosses me aside?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where do you get off...!"
He had me convinced that he was this emotionless machine, coldly focused on achieving his goal.
But that was all an act. No wonder his men looked up to him. They knew what kind of person he really is.
He forced himself to treat me like a tool, and now...

name: トリ
message: "Hurry up and get on."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Fine."
I swallow the lump in my throat and straddle the bike.

name: トリ
message: "We're gonna go fast. Get ready."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh... Actually, hang on."
Akushima...
If I leave him here, he'l die when the tower collapses.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit!"
If I abandon him, I know he'll haunt my dreams forever.
I jump off the bike, run over to him, and drag him back with me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guy weighs a ton..."
I set him on the end of the bike―well, more like hang him off it―get onto the seat, and hold him in place with one arm on his back.

name: トリ
message: "We're taking him with us?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean..."

name: トリ
message: "Heh. Not surprised."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really?"

name: トリ
message: "It's your strength. And your weakness."
I get the feeling he's making fun of me, but before I can say anything, the bike takes off, and I have to grab the handlebars to keep from getting tossed.

name: トリ
message: "Hold on tight. And hold onto him tight too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. I'm counting on you."
